definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Qaramay shehiri (Karamay city) or Kèlāmǎyī prefecture-level city in Xinjiang
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet

pinyin: Ta3 ke4 la1 ma3 gan1 Sha1 mo4

definition: sigma (Greek letter Σσ)/(symbol for standard deviation in statistics)

sentences.english: When dharma is neglected, troubles begin.
sentences.chinese: 当达尔玛被忽略时，麻烦就开始了。

sentences.english: His father is an animal trainer for Mazzola.
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲是玛佐拉的驯兽师。

sentences.english: He declares war on the kingdom of Westmarch.
sentences.chinese: 然后他又向威斯特玛王国宣战。

sentences.english: But in the 100-meter dash, Wilma Rudolph won.
sentences.chinese: 但在一百米短跑中，威尔玛鲁道夫却赢了。

sentences.english: Margaret is calling the shots around our house these days.
sentences.chinese: 玛格里特这几天在我们家发号施令。

sentences.english: Dharma means occupation, which you cannot change.
sentences.chinese: 达尔玛的意思是职业，你无法改变的职业。

sentences.english: Tamar, Judah's daughter-in-law, bore him Perez and Zerah.
sentences.chinese: 犹大的儿妇他玛给犹大生法勒斯和谢拉。

sentences.english: The bull and cow stand symbolic for dharma and the earth respectively.
sentences.chinese: 公牛和母牛分别象征达尔玛和地球。

sentences.english: Seeing this, Manoah and his wife fell with their faces to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 玛挪亚和他的妻看见，就俯伏于地。

sentences.english: It turned out to be Germany's famous Enigma coding machine.
sentences.chinese: 那原来是德国著名的恩尼格玛密码机。

sentences.english: Because experts suspected Soma to be cueing Tito, she taught him to write.
sentences.chinese: 由于专家怀疑是娑玛提供暗示，于是她教会第托写字。

sentences.english: They become the agents of your karma.
sentences.chinese: 他们成了你的卡尔玛的代理人。

sentences.english: And Manoah said, Now let thy words come to pass.
sentences.chinese: 玛挪亚说，愿你的话应验。
威尔玛鲁道夫是20的22名儿童。

sentences.english: It will be a great deal better than leaving him only with Jemima.
sentences.chinese: 这比把他交给杰米玛一个人好多了。

definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Acre, city in Israel, also known as Akko
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
